mapper.select: select count(*) from dispatch where END_TIME between sysdate - 7 and sysdate
select to_date(substr(dp_id,1,4),'yyMM') as standard, count(*) as users from dispatch where DP_STATUS = '5' group by to_date(substr(dp_id,1,4),'yyMM') order by to_date(substr(dp_id,1,4),'yyMM')
select trunc(age/10,0) as ageGroup , count(*) as count from (select ((substr(sysdate,1,2) - substr(m_birth,1,2) + 100)) as age from member) group by trunc(age/10,0) order by ageGroup

select to_date(substr(po_time,1,4),'yyMM') as standard, count(*) as count from point where m_id =#{m_id} and po_exact = '1' group by to_date(substr(po_time,1,4),'yyMM') order by to_date(substr(po_time,1,4),'yyMM')

select to_date(substr(po_time,1,4),'yyMM') as standard, count(*) as count from point where m_id =#{m_id} and po_exact = '0' group by to_date(substr(po_time,1,4),'yyMM') order by to_date(substr(po_time,1,4),'yyMM')
select to_char(end_time,'yyMM') as standard, count(*) as count from DISPATCH where m_id = #{m_id} and substr(dp_id,19) = '1' group by to_char(end_time, 'yyMM') order by to_char(end_time, 'yyMM')
select to_char(end_time,'yyMM') as standard, count(*) as count from DISPATCH where m_id = #{m_id} and substr(dp_id,19) != '1' group by to_char(END_TIME, 'yyMM') order by to_char(end_time, 'yyMM')

select to_date(substr(re_time,1,4),'yyMM') as standard, count(*) as count from receipt where m_id = #{m_id} and use_cash = '0' group by to_date(substr(re_time,1,4),'yyMM') order by to_date(substr(re_time,1,4),'yyMM')

select to_date(substr(re_time,1,4),'yyMM') as standard, count(*) as count from receipt where m_id = #{m_id} and use_cash = '1' group by to_date(substr(re_time,1,4),'yyMM') order by to_date(substr(re_time,1,4),'yyMM')
select * from (select start_place ,count(start_place) as cnt, row_number() over (order by count(start_place) desc) as ranking from dispatch group by start_place) where ranking <= 5
